name: Dinosaur Jump World: Wild Dino
description:
You are a terrifying jurassic dinosaur who lives another wonderful sunny day in the planet Earth... You and your other wild pals have the whole world for you... You are the king of the nature... The master of the universe... The boss of your reign... The terror of the rest of the living beings... This is being like that for millions and millions of years... Until now... Because a massive extinction is about to happen and you are the only hope of your species to survive!

All those paradise mountains, fresh lakes, deep oceans and seas; all those green jungles and immense dry desserts, no longer exist! Everything is turning over into a shaded, dark and dead landscape... surrounded by fire!! Why? Well, that depends! Some history books say it's was a asteroid hitting that triggered dinosaur massive disappearance. Some others state that extreme climate change provoked mighty volcano eruptions and all t-rex, raptors, tyrannosaurus and triceratops were killed!

In Dinosaur Jump World: Dino Casual Simulator Game happens both!! This casual racing simulation game allows you to live endless jurassic adventures, full of wild challenges and epic dangers! Survival should be your unique concern!! Maybe not only yours but you whole species! This is a fight against your extinction; a race against the death! What can you do?

Your fierce mate needs to continuously attack the enemy and jump all the time into same color dinos to go up and up to the sky!! Don't get wrong! Only same color enemies, otherwise you and all your friends and family will be done! And take care of all the dangers that might attack you!!
What a tremendous and fun responsibility; don't you think?!
The world as you know and your whole species depends on you!!

Don't become a fossil and survive! Have fun!
